entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Bagotville

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
